ReactorEE.simulator

Class PlantController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReactorEE.simulator.PlantController

  • public class PlantController
extends java.lang.Object
    PlantController is the "controller" of the MVC design of the game. It has methods necessary to control the data held in Plant, to execute methods that relate to UI functions, to give information about the Plant to an UI.
    Author:
    Lamprey

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PlantController.falableComponents
      List of the components within the plant that can be manually broken.

    • Method Detail

      • setStepLooper

        public void setStepLooper(StepLooper slooper)
        Sets the automatic stepping loop to control the game. Must be called to enable automatic stepping.
        Parameters:
        slooper - The automatic looping object.

      • executeStoredCommand

        public void executeStoredCommand()
        Executes the command that is stored in the operatingSoftware object

      • newGame

        public void newGame(java.lang.String operatorName)
        Creates a new Game - used in UI to start a new game.
        Parameters:
        operatorName - the name of the player

      • newMultiplayerGame

        public void newMultiplayerGame(java.lang.String operatorName)
        Creates a new game for use in multiplayer. This involves not reseting the setpLooper as in a single player now game and reducing the failure rate of falable components.
        Parameters:
        operatorName -

      • saveGame

        public boolean saveGame()
        Saves the state of the current game (plant) into a file called "save.ser" inside the current folder.
        Returns:
        true if saving a game was successful, false otherwise

      • loadGame

        public boolean loadGame()
        Loads the state of the current game (plant) from a file called "save.ser" inside the current folder. If the file does not exist, the load will not be successful (nothing will happen).
        Returns:
        true if loading a game was successful, false otherwise

      • togglePaused

        public void togglePaused()
        Pauses/resumes the game on call.

      • getHighScores

        public java.util.List<HighScore> getHighScores()
        Returns the highscores list.
        Returns:
        list of highscores.

      • addHighScore

        public boolean addHighScore(HighScore newHighScore)
        Adds a new score to high scores if the new score is in the top 10 of all scores.
        Parameters:
        newHighScore - the score to add
        Returns:
        true if adding was successful and the new score is in top 10, false otherwise

      • setValve

        public boolean setValve(int valveID,
               boolean open)
        Parameters:
        valveID - the valve to be set
        open - true to open the valve, false to close it
        Returns:
        true if command was successful, false if a valve with that ID was not found

      • setPumpOnOff

        public boolean setPumpOnOff(int pumpID,
                   boolean on)
        Parameters:
        pumpID - the pump to be set
        on - true to turn the pump on, false to turn it off
        Returns:
        true if command was successful, false if a pump with that ID was not found

      • setPumpRpm

        public boolean setPumpRpm(int pumpID,
                 int rpm)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the RPM of a particular pump.
        Parameters:
        pumpID - the internal ID of the pump
        rpm - the new value of the RPM, needs to be in range (0 to MAX_RPM)
        Returns:
        true if setting the RPM was successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if RPM is out of the allowed range (rpm < 0 || rpm > MAX_RPM).

      • setControlRods

        public void setControlRods(int percentageLowered)
        Sets a new percentage for the control rods. Setting the percentage to 100 means that the control rods are fully inside the reactor and the reaction stops. Setting the percentage to 0 means that the control rods are outside of the reactor.
        Parameters:
        percentageLowered - the new value of percentageLowered

      • quench

        public void quench()
        Activates the Quench Component.

      • repairTurbine

        public boolean repairTurbine()
        Start the repair of the turbine if it has failed.
        Returns:
        true only if the turbine has failed and is not already being repaired

      • repairPump

        public boolean repairPump(int pumpID)
        Start the repair of a particular pump
        Parameters:
        pumpID - the internal ID of the pump to be repaired
        Returns:
        true only if the pump is found, has failed and is not already being repaired

      • repairOperatingSoftware

        public boolean repairOperatingSoftware()
        Start the repair of the operating software if it has failed
        Returns:
        true only if the operating software has failed and is not already being repaired

      • step

        public void step(int numSteps)
        Advance the game by a number of time steps. If the game reaches a game over state before all steps are executed, the game stops stepping.
        Parameters:
        numSteps - number of timesteps to advance the game by.

      • getUIData

        public UIData getUIData()
        Returns:
        the current UIData object related to the plant.

      • getPlant

        public Plant getPlant()
        Returns:
        The current plant in the game.

      • setComponentFailed

        public void setComponentFailed(PlantController.falableComponents component)
        Given the name of a component, takes the instance of that component from the plant, sets it isOperatoional() value to false then adds the component to the list of failed components within the plant.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to be manually broken.

      • parseSabotageCommand

        public PlantController.falableComponents parseSabotageCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Parses a given break command, then breaks the specified inputs. Legal commands: Pump1, Pump2, Pump3, Turbine, Operator Software. Not Case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        command - component breakage command to be parsed.
        Returns:
        the component to be set to failed.

      • setPlant

        public void setPlant(Plant p)
        Parameters:
        p - Plant to set the current plant to.

      • getStepLooper

        public StepLooper getStepLooper()
        Returns:
        automatic stepping thread.
